February 15 spacecraft designed by a
private American company  was
launched into space with a lunar landing mission.
If successful, this will be
America's first lunar landing mission in
more than half a century and also the first time
a private spacecraft has successfully performed it.
This mission Novac lander
designed by the Houston-based company Intuitive Machines
was launched into space by
Space's Falcon 9 booster on the afternoon of
October 15 Vietnam time from the
Kennedy Space Center in the US.  Florida Vu Phong
was carried out a day
later than expected after spacex detected temperature problems
when pumping fuel. Despite the problem, the ship
will still land at a point
about 300 km from the south pole of the moon on
January 22.  2 as expected. Initially, if the mission

to help older people walk and
exercise. A group of researchers in
Korea recently successfully developed
a robot that can be worn on the leg and increase
muscle strength in
humans.  The robot weighs about 2 kg and is worn
on the user's hips and knees.
It has many sensors that help measure the
speed and rotation angle of the hip joint, the position of
pressure on the soles of the feet, and the
robot uses artificial intelligence.  created to
detect whether the surface the user is moving on is a
steep or rough road. With
this data, the robot will create force to support
muscle movement and reduce stress on
muscles due to average gravity. This robot
can  Supports up to 30 minutes of muscle strength for
walkers and the elderly. This
helps them from 10 to 20 years old to
exercise more easily, unlike
these robots that have the function of
robotic rehabilitation therapy.  Ensuring
users are exercising
effectively users can customize
group exercise intensity Research
says efforts are being made to reduce the weight of the
robot to T increase its applicability
